Magnus thought for a moment before answering.

Ultra Magnus: Well, first, w=
e're going to patrol outside of the city.
We've had reports of some unrest =
there, and if we can, we'll have to
find out what's going on. I don't think=
 we'll find much, though.
Rebels tend to keep a low profile until they're r=
eady to strike. No
matter.

He fell silent and serious for a little while b=
efore going on.

Ultra Magnus: After that, we're to report to a compound fu=
rther north
of here. It's an Army facility, so we'll be based alongside uni=
ts from
every factions. I hope you're ready for that, it's quite an experie=
nce.
